title: Metallica -No Life Til Leather   1982-2015  a4k
description:
Metallica Reveal No Life Til Leather Reissue Details

As we previously reported, Metallica will be releasing a limited edition cassette tape of their original 1982 demo "No Life 'til Leather" during this year's Record Store Day on April 18th but we now learn more details and that the band has additional hidden treasures which they are releasing as they see fit.

Metallica have kicked of their reissue series with a No Life 'Til Leather cassette tape He also said to stay tuned for more details on future reissues. Metallica headline this year's Reading and Leeds Festival, supported on the day by Royal Blood
